attributes.action: Give us an alternative to the left-wing news channels available on Freeview UK
attributes.background: I would like the Government to examine the bias around News broadcasting on TV here in the UK. Many of us have become frustrated with what we feel is very left-wing. We need to see some balance in TV news broadcasting, with the equivalent of something like Fox News available in the UK on Freeview.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300700
